metadata.Title: CVE-2018-16368 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.Description: SplashXPath::strokeAdjust in splash/SplashXPath.cc in Xpdf 4.00 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (heap-based buffer over-read) via a crafted pdf file, as demonstrated by pdftoppm.

notes.Note: jdstrand> xpdf in koffice is 2.0 mdeslaur> no indication that this affects poppler, marking as not-affected

criterions.comment: ipe package in impish is affected and may need fixing.
libextractor package in impish is affected and may need fixing.
xpdf package in impish is affected and needs fixing.
